roleset.name: eating, properly and politely

example.name: with ADJ
example.text: No restaurant I 've worked in -LRB- and there have been quite a few - ranging from Subway to fine dining -RRB- would have found that kind of language acceptable , especially within earshot of customers .

example.name: both args
example.text: Their dining on native vegetation has cleared the way for nonnative trees, and maples, to thrive where oaks and hickories are supposed to be

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, dine-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls dine-39.5.
